name: Parazon Poster
description: Mercy Or Convert? A poster for your Orbiter.

languages.description: Gnadenstoß oder konvertieren? Ein Poster für deinen Orbiter.
languages.name: Poster: Parazon

languages.description: Miséricorde ou Conversion? Une affiche pour votre Orbiteur.
languages.name: Affiche Parazon

languages.description: Mercy o Conversione? Un poster per il tuo Orbiter.
languages.name: Poster Parazon

languages.description: 자비냐 전향이냐? 여러분의 오비터를 위한 포스터입니다.
languages.name: 파라존 포스터

languages.description: ¿Misericordia o conversión? Un póster para tu orbitador.
languages.name: Póster de Parazon

languages.description: 怜悯之击还是感化？一张给轨道飞行器的海报。
languages.name: 灭骸之刃海报

languages.description: Милосердие или Обращение? Постер для Вашего Орбитера.
languages.name: Постер: Паразон

languages.description: 転向、またはMercyフィニッシャーをかける？　船内装飾用ポスター。
languages.name: 「Parazon」 ポスター

languages.description: Miłosierdzie czy Konwersja? Plakat do Twojego Orbitera.
languages.name: Plakat Parazonu

languages.description: Misericórdia ou Conversão? Um pôster para colocar em sua Orbital.
languages.name: Pôster: Parazon

languages.description: 慈悲斬殺或皈依？給軌道飛行器的一張海報。
languages.name: 萬靈袖刃海報

languages.description: ฆ่าอย่างเมตตา หรือแปลงให้เป็นพวกเดียวกัน? โปสเตอร์สำหรับออร์บิเตอร์ของคุณ
languages.name: โปสเตอร์: Parazon

languages.description: Merhamet mi, yoksa Dönüşüm mü? Orbiter'in için bir poster.
languages.name: Parazon Posteri
